title: New: Chrome Sparks â€“ Still Sleeping (Feat. Steffaloo)
content:
This new track comes courtesy of CitR favourites glitch-pop artist Chrome Sparks and elegant songstress Steffaloo.

Still Sleeping is an 8-bit influenced affair, using the delightful sampled vocals of Steffaloo to compliment the jagged, electro-pop beat. Still Sleeping is available on a pay what you like basis, via the Chrome Sparks bandcamp; the wonderfully psychedelic artwork comes courtesy of Jheri Evans (Crash Symbols & Get Off The Coast). Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
